text: Bachia geralista is a species of lizard in the family Gymnophthalmidae. It is endemic to Brazil. ==References== Category:Bachia Category:Reptiles described in 2013 Category:Reptiles of Brazil Category:Endemic fauna of Brazil Category:Taxa named by Mauro Teixeira Jr. Category:Taxa named by Renato Recoder Category:Taxa named by Augustín Camacho Guerrero Category:Taxa named by Marco Aurélio de Sena Category:Taxa named by Carlos Arturo Navas Iannini Category:Taxa named by Miguel Trefaut Rodrigues
title: Bachia geralista
